titleStmt.title: The barren tree a sermon preached at Pauls crosse October 26. 1623 / by Tho. Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Matheuues for Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Alley, at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library (New York, N.Y.) and Cambridge University Library.
